message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a new approach for continual learning using Bayesian neural networks and uncertainty-guided learning. The paper focuses on object classification datasets and evaluates the proposed approach extensively. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and computer vision (cs.CV) as it deals with object classification. Additionally, the paper involves neural networks (cs.NE) and natural language processing (cs.CL) as it discusses the importance of uncertainty in identifying what to remember and what to change as we continually learn.
